marketplace_allow_custom_install_url.description: If the vendors are allowed to install custom Marketplace apps with functionality and content in the Pipedrive UI or not

marketplace_app_extensions_vendor.description: If the vendors are allowed to extend their Marketplace apps with functionality and content in the Pipedrive UI or not

marketplace_team.description: If the vendors are allowed to be part of the Marketplace team or not

list_limit.description: Number of results shown in list by default

autofill_deal_expected_close_date.description: If the expected close date of the Deal is filled automatically or not

person_duplicate_condition.description: Allow the vendors to duplicate a Person
